name: Weaponized Pebbles
description: You launch a swarm of pebble-sized rocks at a target within a very short (5 unit) distance. You roll a 1d4, and fire that many pebbles towards a target who must make that many defense checks of 4 or higher. Each pebble that hits deals 2 physical damage, but is mitigated separately.
charge: You launch 1d6 pebbles instead. The damage cannot be mitigated lower than 1 physical damage.
